intro.title: House to Home is an estate agency that helps people live in more thoughtful and beautiful ways.

content.title: Services Offered
content.subtitle:
Comprehensive Solutions for Your Business Needs
Our team of experts provides a range of services tailored to meet the specific needs of your business. From strategic planning to marketing and advertising, we have you covered. Our comprehensive solutions are designed to help you achieve your goals and grow your business.

property_management.title: Property Management
property_management.subtitle:
Professional Management Services for Property Owners
Our property management team provides professional management services for property owners. We take care of all aspects of managing your property, including tenant screening, rent collection, property maintenance, and more. Let us handle the details so you can focus on your other investments.

mortgage_service.title: Mortgage Service
mortgage_service.subtitle:
Comprehensive Mortgage Solutions for Homebuyers
Our mortgage service team provides comprehensive mortgage solutions for homebuyers. Whether you're a first-time homebuyer or an experienced homeowner, we can help you find the right mortgage product to fit your unique needs and budget.

consulting_service.title: Consulting Service
consulting_service.subtitle: Transforming Your Business through Tailored Consulting Services: Leveraging Industry Insights, Data Analysis, and Innovative Strategies to Drive Growth, Increase Efficiency, and Enhance Competitive Advantage

home_buying.title: Home Buying
home_buying.subtitle: Making Your Dream of Home ownership a Reality: Comprehensive Home Buying Services Designed to Guide You through Every Step of the Process, from Financial Planning to Property Search and Closing

home_selling.title: Home Selling
home_selling.subtitle: Maximizing Your Return on Investment: Professional Home Selling Services that Utilize Advanced Marketing Techniques, Pricing Analysis, and Skilled Negotiation to Ensure a Smooth and Profitable Sale of Your Property

escrow_services.title: Escrow Services
escrow_services.subtitle: Secure and Efficient Transaction Management: Trustworthy Escrow Services to Facilitate the Exchange of Funds and Documentation, Providing Peace of Mind for Buyers, Sellers, and Service Providers Alike

form.title: Do You Have An Upcoming Real Estate Transaction?
form.subtitle: Expert Assistance for Your Next Real Estate Transaction: Comprehensive Services and Personalized Support to Help You Navigate the Complexities of Buying or Selling Property with Confidence and Success

termsOfUse:
Terms of Use for HouseToHome

Welcome to HouseToHome! By using our website, you agree to be bound by the following terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.

Acceptance of Terms

These Terms of Use constitute a binding agreement between you and HouseToHome. We may modify these terms at any time, and such modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our website after any such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the modified terms.

Use of our Website

You may use our website for your personal and non-commercial purposes only. You may not use our website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, and you agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using our website. You may not use our website in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks, or interfere with any other user's use and enjoyment of our website.

Intellectual Property

All content on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of HouseToHome or its licensors and is protected by United States and international copyright and trademark laws. You may not modify, copy, reproduce, publish, transmit, distribute, display, perform, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any such content without our prior written consent.

User Content

You are solely responsible for any content that you post, upload, publish, submit, or transmit to or through our website ("User Content"). You represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights to grant the licenses and permissions required to use your User Content as described in these terms. By posting, uploading, publishing, submitting, or transmitting User Content to or through our website, you grant HouseToHome a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, modify, create derivative works from, perform, and distribute your User Content in any and all media or distribution methods now known or hereafter devised.

Limitation of Liability

In no event shall HouseToHome be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use or inability to use our website, whether based on warranty, contract, tort, or any other legal theory, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages, so the above limitation may not apply to you.

Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold HouseToHome and its officers, directors, employees, and agents harmless from any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or relating to your use of our website, your User Content, or your violation of these terms.

Governing Law

These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. You agree that any action at law or in equity arising out of or relating to these terms shall be filed only in the state or federal courts located in Los Angeles County, California, and you hereby consent and submit to the personal jurisdiction of such courts for the purposes of litigating any such action.

Termination

We reserve the right to terminate your access to our website at any time, without notice, for any reason or no reason at all. All provisions of these terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive.
privacyPolicy:
International Users

Our website is hosted in the United States and is intended for users located in the United States. If you access our website from outside the United States, please be aware that your personal information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States, where our servers are located. By using our website, you consent to the transfer of your personal information to the United States.

Your Rights and Choices

You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also have the right to object to or restrict our use of your personal information, or to receive a copy of your personal information in a structured, machine-readable format. To exercise these rights, please contact us at insert contact information.

Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by HouseToHome. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party websites or services. We encourage you to read the privacy policies and terms of use of these third-party websites or services before using them.

Do Not Track Signals

Some browsers may allow you to send "do not track" signals to websites you visit. We do not currently respond to these signals, and our website may continue to collect information in the manner described in this privacy policy.

California Privacy Rights

If you are a California resident, you have certain privacy rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). To learn more about these rights and how to exercise them, please see our California Privacy Notice insert link.

Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time by posting a new version on our website. We will notify you of any material changes to this policy by posting a notice on our website or by other means. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our use of your personal information, please contact us at insert contact information.
